subject: Deaths (Fatalities)
Giro d'Italia (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: Alberto Contador, the overall leader, won a mountain time trial in the Giro d’Italia, and dedicated it to the Spanish rider Xavier Tondo, who died Monday in an accident in Spain.
snippet: Alberto Contador, the overall leader, won a mountain time trial in the Giro d’Italia, and dedicated it to the Spanish rider Xavier Tondo, who died Monday in an accident in Spain.
